tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Title: Exceptional Dental Care: A Must-Visit Practice for Everyone

As someone who values top-notch dental care, I can confidently say that Dr. Ananya Mishra & Dr. Akshay Khandelwal and their team offer an unparalleled experience that sets a new standard in professionalism and excellence. From the moment you step into their pristine clinic, you're greeted with warmth and efficiency, setting the tone for a remarkable visit.

The expertise of both the doctors  is immediately evident. Their deep knowledge of dentistry is matched only by their genuine passion for helping patients achieve optimal oral health. Whether you're in for a routine cleaning or a more complex procedure, you can trust that you're in the hands of a true professional who prioritizes your comfort and well-being above all else.

What truly sets Dr. Ananya & Dr. Akshay apart is commitment to personalized care. They take the time to listen to your concerns, thoroughly explain treatment options, and tailor their approach to meet your specific needs. This level of attention to detail ensures that every patient receives the individualized care they deserve, resulting in outcomes that exceed expectations.

Moreover, the clinic's state-of-the-art facilities and advanced technology further enhance the overall experience. From cutting-edge diagnostic tools to innovative treatment techniques,the latest advancements in dentistry to deliver exceptional results with precision and efficiency.

But beyond their technical expertise, what truly makes Dr.Akshay Khandelwal  & Dr Ananya  standout is their genuine compassion and dedication to their patients' well-being. They go above and beyond to create a welcoming and supportive environment where patients feel valued, respected, and empowered to take control of their oral health.

In summary, I wholeheartedly recommend [Dr. Akshay Khandelwal & Dr Ananya Mishra to anyone in search of top-tier dental care. Their combination of professionalism, expertise, personalized attention, and compassion makes them a true standout in the field. Trust me, once you experience the exceptional care you'll never want to go anywhere else for your dental needs.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Fillings,Inlays and Onlays,Smile Design,Zirconia Crowns,
review: Dr Akshay , not only is he brilliant himself ,  he is having a team of par excellent doctors ,( specialists from different fields ) who do a through check of your dental health and works on a plan that addresses all your issues . This approach of the entire clinic makes me go to Kolkata from Delhi to have my dental issues sorted out which is always done to total satisfaction and total comfort.  With the latest equipment and the upgradation of the clinic you get a world class experience . Sometimes I feel the  clinic is undercharging , with the kind of sheer professionalism and sincerity that Dr Akshay works to  resolve your dental issues . The best part of the experience is that Dr Akshay makes you feel so confident in the treatment that he plans , that you get totally relaxed and worryless .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: He was a very patient listener and understood my problem.  He explained me about the steps to be taken forward.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
context: Cavities,Dental Cavities,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Cracked Teeth,Dental Fillings,
review: Akshay Sir is very good doctor, I have ever seen... My First RCT was done by sir and he worked very kindly and painlessly ..I had very much low confidence and fear that I never went to any RCT or Fillings because of others experience story..But sir makes his work me confident and I had 2 RCT and 5 fillings.. without any pain..my experience was awesome thank you sir and visit me a right place ðŸ¤˜

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Akshay is an excellent doctor. Great work. The procedure was painless and the patient remains comfortable throughout the procedure. The atmosphere of the clinic is also very welcoming.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: It was my first visit to any dentist. He did x-rays of my teeth, explained the issue in detail and recommended for immediate RCT.  As I was having less time due to my marriage, he was able to treat me within short span of time. Happy with the treatment and writing this review post 10 days of treatment. Doctor is friendly, understand your issue and treated me with due care.  Good work by Dr. Akshay Khandelwal. They have a good practice to call the patients for their well-being post treatment. Kudos to the team. Good work by Dr. Ananya Mishra as she did good job for placement of caps.  She too understand the issue and explain them in detail to make sure that all the relevant information has been passed on to the patient. I would recommend this team for your dental issues.Only negative is that the fees for RCT and caps are little expensive than most.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Satisfied with the treatment. Treatment was well explained to me.I am very happy with the treatment  and for further follow ups  shall go there only.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: He was quite friendly and serious . The  waiting space is very small without any toilet facility. The elderly and diabetic attendant of the patient  faces a great trouble for this reason as the procedure takes its own time. The manegement should takes care of it !

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Akshay Khandelwal is really nice* ** *** **** ******* ****** Visited him for RCT, this was the most painless RCT I have ever gone through. He infact played song so that I can feel comfortable. Would like to recommend if you are having any endodontic problem

I had 2 sit-ups and both went really well and the pain was relived. Great doctor Highly recommended!

I highly recommend him if you are looking for someone to rely on and looking for premium services.

review:
I have started the medicine. Feeling some extortion, may be due to journey/ may be age factor, however I hope it will not continue.
One thing I would like to inform about my worry about the full scalling and polishing of tooth, as all of my teeth are very sensetive and enamel is mostly rub out and after this scalling may hamper my feelings further.
Please look into the issue.
Aniruddha De

tags: Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: ** ****** ********** ** *** ** *** ****** ******* ** ******* *** **** ***** ********** He has mastery in his work. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: All the doctors of Gajanan clinic viz . Dr. Akshay Khandelwal, Dr. Ananya Mishra , Dr. Ankit Khandelwal and Dr. Tamannah including all the staff were very much helpful and courteous during my entire RCT procedure. I would recommend everyone with any kind of tooth problem to visit Gajanan clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: l was always a nervous person scared of surgery and injections. But Dr khandelwal was very patient and explained to me the whole process. I thank him for making me feel comfortable and at ease with myself. The whole process of RCT was done so beautifully that l did not feel any pain even when l went back home. I highly recommend him to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Thankyou Dr. Akshay for a pain-free procedure. 
He is friendly at the same time highly professional. Doctor explained me the whole problem and procedure in great details and ensured i felt comfortable throughout the procedure.
He will definitely give you the right advice for your dental problems. 
Highly recommended.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had gone for RCT and had a notion that three to four sittings are needed after checking with Dr Akshay he confirmed he can try as most RCTs are done by him.in one sitting and actually he finished in one sitting only without any issues and ita a fantastic team work between all the dentists in this clinic which is highly appreciable

tags: None
review:
I am glad that I found this clinic. :) 
Dr. Khandelwal is very friendly and Caring...
Got my RCT and crown done... it was really satisfying. 


I would definitely recommend Gajanan Clinic to all my family and friends for dental treatment. It was really a great experience being there.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am very much satisfied with Dr. Akshay. He is very very well mannered and polite and explains quite well about the problem. I would definitely recommend him for any sort of dental problem. I met such a well mannered doctor in quite a long time. Thank u doctor

tags: None
review:
It was my first visit to the dentist and I was a little apprehensive at first but Dr. Khandelwal made the entire process smooth and efficient. 
I needed to have my teeth scaled and he was very comforting and thorough during the procedure. He creates a very friendly ambience and is undoubtedly the finest endodontist in the city. Highly recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: They have professional equipments for all dental procedures. Doctor was very friendly and there was no pain during the treatment. Overall satisfied with my experience here.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The doctor made me comfortable and showed the problems I had , then later we had brief discussion about problems and the solution. The teeth were fixed without any pain and efficiently.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This was the first time I visited a Dentist's clinic. Dr. Akshay and Dr. Ananya are both very friendly and they make the patient feel very comfortable. Dr. Akshay and Dr Ananya are both very skilled doctors and therefore the consultation and the procedures were done very efficiently. I'd highly recommend Gajanan Clinic to everyone. The staff too was very efficient at the clinic. Dr Akshay always makes sure to follow up with the patient after every procedure.  Dr. Ananya is very approachable and listens to our queries even when if contact her personally. Overall it was a great experience.
